title: K/2 Ian / K-ET

authors.name: Ian Probert
authors.affiliation: CNRS-Sorbonne Université, Station Biologique, Place G. Tessier 29680 Roscoff FRANCE

source.description:
ABCD
    1Quantity Compound Stock solution (sterile) Final conc. in K medium
    20.5ml NaNO3 48.9542g/litre H2O 288µM
    30.5ml NH4Cl * 0.535g/litre H2O 5µM
    40.5ml KH2PO4 4.8992g/litre H2O 18µM
    50.5ml FeEDTA solution (see recipe below) (see below)
    60.5ml Trace metal solution (see recipe below) (see below)
    71.0ml f/2 vitamin solution (see recipe below) (see below)
    * optional

ABCD
1Quantity Compound Stock solution (sterile) Final conc. in K medium
20.5ml NaNO3 48.9542g/litre H2O 288µM
30.5ml NH4Cl * 0.535g/litre H2O 5µM
40.5ml KH2PO4 4.8992g/litre H2O 18µM
50.5ml FeEDTA solution (see recipe below) (see below)
60.5ml Trace metal solution (see recipe below) (see below)
71.0ml f/2 vitamin solution (see recipe below) (see below)

• To 950ml distilled H2O add:
  • Quantity Compound Stock solution Final conc. in K medium 4.3g (Na)FeEDTA - 5.85µM
  • Make up to 1 litre with milliQ H2O, sterilize (filter 0.22µm) and store in fridge.
ABCD
1Quantity Compound Stock solution Final conc. in K medium
24.3g (Na)FeEDTA - 5.85µM

ABCD
1Quantity Compound Stock solution Final conc. in K medium
24.3g (Na)FeEDTA - 5.85µM

• To 950ml distilled H2O add:
  • Quantity Compound Stock solution Final conc. in K medium 37.22g Na2EDTA.2H2O - 50µM 1.0ml CuSO4.5H2O 2.497g/litre H2O 0.005µM 1.0ml Na2MoO4.2H2O 7.2585g/litre H2O 0.015µM 1.0ml ZnSO4.7H2O 23.0g/litre H2O 0.004µM 1.0ml CoSO4.7H2O 14.055g/litre H2O 0.025µM 1.0ml MnCl2.4H2O 178.11g/litre H2O 0.45µM 1.0ml H2SeO3 1.29g/litre H2O 0.005µM 1.0ml NiCl2.6H20 1.49 g/litre H2O 0.00314µM
  • Make up to 1 litre with milliQ H2O, sterilize (filter 0.22µm) and store in fridge.
ABCD
1Quantity Compound Stock solution Final conc. in K medium
237.22g Na2EDTA.2H2O - 50µM
31.0ml CuSO4.5H2O 2.497g/litre H2O 0.005µM
41.0ml Na2MoO4.2H2O 7.2585g/litre H2O 0.015µM
51.0ml ZnSO4.7H2O 23.0g/litre H2O 0.004µM
61.0ml CoSO4.7H2O 14.055g/litre H2O 0.025µM
71.0ml MnCl2.4H2O 178.11g/litre H2O 0.45µM
81.0ml H2SeO3 1.29g/litre H2O 0.005µM
91.0ml NiCl2.6H20 1.49 g/litre H2O 0.00314µM

ABCD
1Quantity Compound Stock solution Final conc. in K medium
237.22g Na2EDTA.2H2O - 50µM
31.0ml CuSO4.5H2O 2.497g/litre H2O 0.005µM
41.0ml Na2MoO4.2H2O 7.2585g/litre H2O 0.015µM
51.0ml ZnSO4.7H2O 23.0g/litre H2O 0.004µM
61.0ml CoSO4.7H2O 14.055g/litre H2O 0.025µM
71.0ml MnCl2.4H2O 178.11g/litre H2O 0.45µM
81.0ml H2SeO3 1.29g/litre H2O 0.005µM
91.0ml NiCl2.6H20 1.49 g/litre H2O 0.00314µM

• To 950ml distilled H2O add
  • Quantity Compound Stock solution Final conc. in K medium 1.0ml Vit. B12 (cyanocobalamin) 0.5g/litre H2O 0.37nM 1.0ml Biotin 5.0mg/litre H2O 2.0nM 100.0mg Thiamine HCl - 0.3µM
  • Make up to 1 litre with milliQ H2O, filter sterilize into plastic vials and store in freezer.
ABCD
1Quantity Compound Stock solution Final conc. in K medium
21.0ml Vit. B12 (cyanocobalamin) 0.5g/litre H2O 0.37nM
31.0ml Biotin 5.0mg/litre H2O 2.0nM
4100.0mg Thiamine HCl - 0.3µM

ABCD
1Quantity Compound Stock solution Final conc. in K medium
21.0ml Vit. B12 (cyanocobalamin) 0.5g/litre H2O 0.37nM
31.0ml Biotin 5.0mg/litre H2O 2.0nM
4100.0mg Thiamine HCl - 0.3µM

• Optional: Heat to 80°C for 2 hours and leave to cool – this should kill most organisms but should not chemically modify the medium too much
  • Filter sterilize through 0.22µm filters (e.g. Millipore Steritop units) into sterile (autoclaved) polycarbonate bottles.

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"12mk5","text":"Sample 10 g of dry soil from a place that does not contain any pesticide nor pollutant and where you can be sure to be able to come back in order to always use the same soil. The soil must be dry because the boiling step will be longer if the soil is not dry. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6bvr1","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"4E0846DDA4C64E4795342C434BC795C1","id":658824,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8sce8","text":"Add the 10 g soil to 400ml of milliQ water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1av4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhp9q","text":"Filter on 0.2 \u00b5m or first through 0.8\/0.4 \u00b5m and then through 0.2\u00b5m in order not to clog the filter. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4qojf","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"av83j","text":"Add 30 \u00e0 50ml of soil extract per 1 L of medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

description:
Modified from K medium by Ian Probert
Reference 
Keller, M.D., Selvin, R.C., Claus, W. & Guillard, R.R.L. 1987. Media for the culture of oceanic ultraphytoplankton. J. Phycol. 23:633–8.
